title: Two Gigahertz Low-Loss RF Splitters for TV and Satellite MKII - 2 Way 2 GigaHertz RF Splitter
description: 2 GHz SplitterUltra-Low Loss, Extended Bandwidth Coax Signal SeparationEnjoy the convenience and flexibility of accurately separating high-bandwidth TV signals to multiple components. Now you can share a single line for your Cable TV and Internet service or even split over-the air HD (digital TV) antenna signals.Highest Signal Integrity for the Best Possible PicturePrecise internal impedance matching and 24k gold center contacts maximize signal integrity and picture quality. Available with 1 input and your choice of 2, 3, or 4 outputs.NOTE:The DB Loss per output is:TGHZ-2RF5MHz-1GHz: -3.4dB1GHz- 2GHz: -4.9dBTGHZ-3RF5MHz-1GHz: -5.7dB1GHz- 2GHz: -8.9dBTGHZ-4RF5MHz-1GHz: -7.4dB1GHz- 2GHz: -9.6dB
